column1: Nimbrethil was a region of birchwoods that lay in the land of Arvernien
column2: on the northern shore of the Bay of Balar.  Wood from the forests of Nimbrethil was used by Eärendil to construct his ship Vingilot.

column1: The woods were recalled by Bilbo Baggins in his Song of Eärendil.

column2: composed of the words nim and Brethil (Sindarin word). Nimbrethil is translated to "silver birches"
